mapper.select: SELECT Q.QNA_NUM , M.MEM_NAME AS WRITER , Q.QNA_TITLE , Q.QNA_WRITE_DATE , Q.QNA_STATUS FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN , A.QNA_NUM , A.WRITER , A.QNA_TITLE , A.QNA_WRITE_DATE , A.QNA_STATUS FROM( SELECT QNA_NUM , WRITER , QNA_TITLE , QNA_WRITE_DATE , QNA_STATUS FROM QNA WHERE DELETE_YN = 'n' ORDER BY QNA_WRITE_DATE DESC ) A ) Q, MEM M WHERE Q.WRITER = M.MEM_CODE AND RN > ( #{pageNum} - 1 ) * #{amount} AND RN <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}
SELECT Q.QNA_NUM , M.MEM_NAME AS WRITER , Q.QNA_TITLE , Q.QNA_CTS , Q.QNA_WRITE_DATE , Q.QNA_STATUS , Q.WRITER as MEMCODE FROM QNA Q, MEM M WHERE Q.WRITER = M.MEM_CODE AND QNA_NUM = #{qnaNum}
SELECT QNA_NUM , QNA_ANSW_CTS , QNA_ANSW_WRITE_DATE FROM QNA_ANSW WHERE QNA_NUM = #{qnaNum}
